title: Travel awards 2015: Win a luxury safari - Travel Awards 2015 - Travel
text:
Visit independent.co.uk/travelawards2015 to nominate across the 16 categories and be in with a chance of winning a luxury safari in South Africa, as well as tickets to the awards ceremony at the Corinthia Hotel London on 7 October.
Have your say and you could be flying off to South Africa, courtesy of Flight Centre (0800 188 4593; flightcentre.co.uk ) on a fantastic holiday for two, staying at Sabi Sabi Private Game Reserve for four nights before flying with South African Airways to Cape Town for three nights at Grootbos Private Nature Reserve, with full board, wildlife drives and various activities included.
Perhaps you'd like to celebrate your top family-friendly hotel (The Pig and Landmark Trust properties have caught our eye) or recognise the destinations that have made a concerted effort to welcome tourists by cutting red tape (India and Vietnam for example) or those places reviving heritage attractions (Margate, Co Antrim).
There's also the chance to nominate your favourite airline, train operator, ferry company, app, guidebook and more, as well as the Reader's Choice Award, the only category to be decided purely by your nominations rather than our independent panel of experts. It recognises the figure who has done most for travellers, through innovation or inspiration.To see a full list of the categories and the judges, visit independent.co.uk/travelawards2015 . Nominations close on 13 September 2015, and the winners will be announced on 7 October.
